sentences.sContent: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.sCn: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.sContent: He put a harness on each of us, and we were hauled into the helicopter.
sentences.sContent_eng: He put a harness on each of us, and we were hauled into the helicopter.
sentences.sCn: 他在我们每个人头上套上一个套索，然后我们被拉进了直升飞机。

sentences.sContent: It would be similar to a Humvee vehicle for patrolling on the ground but could turn into a helicopter at the touch of a button in an emergency.
sentences.sContent_eng: It would be similar to a Humvee vehicle for patrolling on the ground but could turn into a helicopter at the touch of a button in an emergency.
sentences.sCn: 这款车平时能够像悍马一样在陆地上驰骋，但是遇到紧急情况，只需要轻轻按一下按钮，它就能变成一台直升飞机。

sentences.sContent: ...Buckleitner spent the breaks testing whether his own remote-control helicopter could reach the hall's...

remMethod.val: helico(螺旋) ＋ pter → 带螺旋翼的飞机 → 直升机

trans.tranOther: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly
